segment.source: How to use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add accelerators to employee devices.
segment.target: How to use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add accelerators to employee devices.

segment.source: Use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Accelerators page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Accelerators page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you add accelerators to your employee computers.
segment.target: The Accelerators page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you add accelerators to your employee computers.

segment.source: Accelerators are contextual menu options that can quickly get to a web service from any webpage.
segment.target: Accelerators are contextual menu options that can quickly get to a web service from any webpage.

segment.source: For example, an accelerator can look up a highlighted word in the dictionary or a selected location on a map.
segment.target: For example, an accelerator can look up a highlighted word in the dictionary or a selected location on a map.

segment.source: The customizations you make on this page apply only to Internet Explorer for the desktop.
segment.target: The customizations you make on this page apply only to Internet Explorer for the desktop.

segment.source: Click Import to automatically import your existing accelerators from your current version of IE into this list.
segment.target: Click Import to automatically import your existing accelerators from your current version of IE into this list.

segment.source: Click Add to add more accelerators.
segment.target: Click Add to add more accelerators.

segment.source: Use the Browse button to go to your custom accelerator XML file.
segment.target: Use the Browse button to go to your custom accelerator XML file.

segment.source: Check the Set this Accelerator as the default for the category box if you want this accelerator to be the default value that shows up for the category.
segment.target: Check the Set this Accelerator as the default for the category box if you want this accelerator to be the default value that shows up for the category.

segment.source: Click Edit to change your accelerator information, click Set Default to make an accelerator the default value for a category, or Remove to delete an accelerator.
segment.target: Click Edit to change your accelerator information, click Set Default to make an accelerator the default value for a category, or Remove to delete an accelerator.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page or Back to go to the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page or Back to go to the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page.
